Posts.Content: Oct 6, 2007 10:55PM jlfpt wrote: I just started TC on thursday 10/4 went to work fine the next day, neulasta shot yesterday, a little slow today but not too bad yet, the anti-nausea meds are working prety good. I've had a port for a year and a 1/2 for infusions for a neurlogical disease(that they think now may be caused by the undetected tumor and may be cured by the chemo as well!!) stage IIA grade 2 vascular invasion. Surgery 9/6 bilat mastÂ (and 9/7 for a hemorrhage!) back to the gym on day 4 and to work as a PT on day 10. I think chemo is going to be tougher than the surgery, Thank you all for the input and best of luck for a smooth trip through this chemical train wreck!!!
Posts.Title: October 2007 Chemo Girls 3boys4me saucybee
